__e: I think... you do not cry, but I do not read.
There are so many crying faces at this funeral and you seem the saddest, but you weren't crying, so I took a picture.
And if we have a baby one day... and the doctor hands it to you in the delivery room... and you don't cry, so what?
A grown man, crying like a baby...
Sweetheart, you know, you cry just like when you were little.
But how can I give it to you, when you be crying like a child?
- Sorry. - Are you crying because of What you went through to get to this point?
I don't want you to cry for me.
